caption.center: STATE v. RICHARD E. FREEMAN AND JOHN M. ABBOTT.

opinion.posture: Motion of the State to clarify the record is denied as being moot.
opinion.attorneys:
Julius C. Michaelson, Attorney General, John A. Murphy, Special Asst. Attorney General, for plaintiff.
William F. Reilly, Public Defender, Peter DiBiase, Asst. Public Defender, for defendants.
